CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: [5][6][7] While the advantage of P3HT is its simple structure with a relatively high hole mobility , the weak point of P3HT as the photovoltaic donor material towards efficient PSCs is the mismatch of its absorption spectrum ( absorption edge is about 650 nm ) with the terrestrial solar spectrum.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P3HT |
| terrestrial solar spectrum |

The two "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are "P3HT" and "terrestrial solar spectrum".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P3HT |

After re-evaluating the paragraph, I found that "terrestrial solar spectrum" is not a material name. Therefore, the only valid "Material Name" entity in the paragraph is "P3HT".
